context: Dropbox, Inc. is a cloud storage and collaboration platform focused on file sync, sharing, and team collaboration tools. AI-powered work assistant. Competing with Google Drive, Microsoft.

competitors.name: Google Drive/Workspace
competitors.notes: Integrated cloud storage with Google's productivity suite

competitors.name: Microsoft OneDrive
competitors.notes: Cloud storage integrated with Microsoft 365 ecosystem

competitors.name: Apple iCloud
competitors.notes: Cloud storage for Apple ecosystem users

competitors.name: Notion
competitors.notes: All-in-one workspace competing in team collaboration and documentation

competitors.name: Sync.com
competitors.notes: Privacy-focused cloud storage with end-to-end encryption

competitors.name: pCloud
competitors.notes: Cloud storage with lifetime plans and strong security features

competitors.name: Egnyte
competitors.notes: Enterprise file sync and share with hybrid cloud capabilities
